131
ADMINISTRATOR OF AN ESTATE
(1) When the heirs are not known or if their address is unknown, and in other cases where it is necessary, the court shall appoint a temporary administrator of the estate; he or she shall be entitled to sue or be sued on behalf of the heirs, to collect claims, pay debts and generally represent the heirs.
(2) The court shall inform the competent social services centre of this appointment, which can appoint another administrator.
